author: newsr.in
title: Zen Pinball 2 - Balls of Glory Review (PlayStation 4)
text: Archer has parked his damn car on the right side of this table, and it's basically impossible to make some of the most interesting shots if it is not removed, which requires solid skill in itself and a good knowledge of the table. When I started playing this new table for Zen Pinball 2, introduced via the Balls of Glory pack, I sometimes lost balls so quickly and after such weird interactions with the environment that I wondered if playing well on it was actually possible, ... Â»
